statements: SELECT * FROM wealth_management_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_type FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT client_id, amount FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM wealth_management_transactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM wealth_management_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT client_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM wealth_management_transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM wealth_management_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT client_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM client_accounts GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(account_id) AS num_accounts FROM client_accounts GROUP BY client_id HAVING num_accounts > 1;
SELECT * FROM client_transactions;
SELECT client_id, transaction_date, amount FROM client_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_type, description FROM client_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM client_transactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM client_transactions WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM client_transactions WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM client_transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_amount > 10000;
SELECT ct.transaction_id, ct.amount, ca.balance FROM client_transactions ct INNER JOIN client_accounts ca ON ct.client_id = ca.client_id WHERE ct.amount > ca.balance;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, MAX(ct.amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM clients c INNER JOIN client_transactions ct ON c.client_id = ct.client_id GROUP BY c.client_id ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_dob FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT account_type, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT client_name, amount FROM clients c JOIN accounts a ON c.client_id = a.client_id WHERE a.balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_dob FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT a.account_id, a.account_type, ah.amount FROM accounts a JOIN account_history ah ON a.account_id = ah.account_id WHERE ah.transaction_id = 100;
SELECT t.client_id, t.amount, c.client_name FROM transactions t JOIN clients c ON t.client_id = c.client_id WHERE t.amount < 500 AND c.client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM client_accounts ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM client_accounts WHERE client_id = 10;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS highest_balance FROM client_accounts;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM client_transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT advisor_id, COUNT(client_id) AS client_count FROM advisor_clients GROUP BY advisor_id ORDER BY client_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name FROM clients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM client_accounts GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM client_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
